name: Gingerbread Cookies
instructions: In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, ginger, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream butter and brown sugar until light and fluffy.
Add molasses, egg, and vanilla extract. Mix well.
Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients, mixing until a dough forms.
Chill dough for at least 1 hour.
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Roll dough out on a floured surface and cut into shapes.
Place on baking sheets and bake for 8-10 minutes. Cool completely before decorating.
notes: Decorate with icing and candy for festive treats.

name: Shortbread Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C).
In a large bowl, cream butter and powdered sugar until light and fluffy.
Add vanilla extract and mix well.
Gradually add flour and salt, mixing until dough forms.
Roll out dough and cut into desired shapes.
Place cookies on a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes, or until edges are lightly golden.
Cool on wire racks before serving.
notes: Dip in melted chocolate for an elegant touch.

name: Lemon Butter Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a large bowl, cream butter, sugar, and lemon zest until smooth.
Add lemon juice and mix well.
Gradually add flour and salt, mixing until dough forms.
Roll dough into small balls and place on a baking sheet.
Flatten each ball with a fork.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until edges are lightly golden. Cool on wire racks.
notes: Sprinkle with powdered sugar for extra sweetness.

name: Pumpkin Spice Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream butter and brown sugar until smooth.
Add pumpkin puree, egg, and vanilla extract. Mix until combined.
Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients, mixing until dough forms.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until edges are golden. Cool on wire racks.
notes: Pair with cream cheese frosting for a decadent treat.

name: Macadamia Nut Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
In a large bowl, cream butter, brown sugar, and white sugar until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract until combined.
In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add dry ingredients to wet ingredients. Mix until combined.
Fold in macadamia nuts.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until golden brown. Cool on wire racks.
notes: Add white chocolate chips for extra sweetness.
